className.description: custom className applied on main container

id.description: [id parameter](https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_id.asp) (for styling/testing purpose, to easily find the component into the DOM)

style.description: Css inline properties applied on main container

unstyled.description: If `true`, no standard MoBrix-ui styles will be applied on the components (useful for example, with image buttons)

disabled.description: If true, disable the component. The effect may vary depending on the component type

additionalProps.description: Custom additional properties, applied to the component
